column5: I hear a story Evergreen is sold. Any one hear any thing about it?
I certainly hope not as we love Pat and the lodge. If anyone can update us, please do! Thanks
Don't want to be the bearer of bad news but I saw this and called Patti and it is true that the camp has sold.
Thanks for the update. Guess Pat will reach out to us guests or perhaps it will be the new owner. Our group wishes Pat the best - just a great lady and fine host.
I guess that answers my question on who bought it, figured.
I never asked who bought it.i just asked if it was sold.ill find out tomorrow and let you know.most likely it won't be a local.
My brother talked to Pat yesterday. She said she in process of selling but the camp is not sold as of yet. She said if camp is sold all existing reservations will be honored.
Any news on the sale of the camp? Tried calling Patti but got no answer.
Am going up on June 16 for a week. I wonder how it,s going to be now that Patty isn,t going to be there?
